secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with a beach vacation can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "sunscreen" and "beach towel".

Yes, you can bring sunglasses.

Based on the items that have been allowed so far—"sunscreen," "beach towel," "flip-flops," "swimsuit," and "sunglasses"—it seems like the secret rule might be related to items you typically bring to a beach.

The rule appears to be that you can bring items that are typically associated with the beach or beach activities. This includes items that are commonly brought to or used at the beach for leisure, play, or sun protection.
Correct! The rule is: Only items that are typically associated with a beach vacation can be brought to the picnic.
